name: eupthistrl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(ceupth, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2))

stmt.origin: simplbi(wbr(c0, cfv(ceupth, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wfo(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c1))))
stmt.pretty: simplbi(c0[(EulerPaths ` c1)]c2, c0[(Trails ` c1)]c2, (c0 :(0[..^](# ` c0))↠ dom((iEdg ` c1))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(ceupth, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2))
-| wb(wbr(c0, cfv(ceupth, c1), c2), wa(wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wfo(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c1)))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0[(EulerPaths ` c1)]c2 → c0[(Trails ` c1)]c2)
⊣ (c0[(EulerPaths ` c1)]c2 ↔(c0[(Trails ` c1)]c2 ∧(c0 :(0[..^](# ` c0))↠ dom((iEdg ` c1)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(ceupth, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2))
-| wb(wbr(c0, cfv(ceupth, c1), c2), wa(wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wfo(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c1)))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0[(EulerPaths ` c1)]c2 → c0[(Trails ` c1)]c2)
⊣ (c0[(EulerPaths ` c1)]c2 ↔(c0[(Trails ` c1)]c2 ∧(c0 :(0[..^](# ` c0))↠ dom((iEdg ` c1)))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, cfv(ceupth, c1), c2), wa(wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wfo(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c1)))))
-| wceq(cfv(ciedg, c1), cfv(ciedg, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0[(EulerPaths ` c1)]c2 ↔(c0[(Trails ` c1)]c2 ∧(c0 :(0[..^](# ` c0))↠ dom((iEdg ` c1)))))
⊣ (iEdg ` c1)=(iEdg ` c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(ceupth, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2))
-| wceq(cfv(ciedg, c1), cfv(ciedg, c1))
|- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(ceupth, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2))

comment: An Eulerian path is a trail. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 24-Nov-2017.) (Revised by AV, 18-Feb-2021.)
